chapters.title: Prologue: By Grace and Banners Fallen
chapters.info: Jesamyn, p. 59—One of the Kin. She was unable to Heal Talmanes's wound, caused by multiple cuts from a Thakan'dar-forged blade. She is young looking, and has golden hair. She is the only one of the four Kin that Elayne left behind in Caemlyn that survived the Trolloc invasion.
